data.title: Examples of "Ryan" in a Sentence
data.meta_description: Learn how to use "ryan" in a sentence with 316 example sentences on YourDictionary.

Stars of MTV's Teen Mom Maci and Ryan have been on a roller coaster ride since Maci got pregnant at 16.

Once son Bentley was born, however, Ryan wasn't so enamored with being a father.

Maci had to rely on her family for help after the birth, and Ryan spent most of his time going out with his friends.

By the time the first season of Teen Mom rolled around, however, Maci and Ryan were reunited and living together.

Ryan spent most of his evenings with his friends, while Maci stayed home with Bentley and tried to balance caring for him with studying for the classes she was taking at the local community college.

After Ryan refused to make a commitment to stop going out and get involved in raising their son, Maci returned her engagement ring and moved back in with her parents.

By season two of Teen Mom Maci and Ryan were coming to terms with sharing custody of Bentley.

Maci, who was still living with her parents while going to school and working full time, had Bentley most of the time with Ryan taking him every other weekend.

The uneasy peace they had found began to show some cracks mid-season when both Maci and Ryan began dating other people.

Maci became involved with an old flame, Kyle, who lived in Nashville, a few hours away from Maci and Ryan's Chattanooga base.

She told Ryan about her plans to move the morning she was leaving, prompting Ryan to file court papers requesting a legal custody agreement.

By the end of season two, Maci and Ryan had successfully agreed to a custody arrangement with the help of a mediator, and avoided a court battle.

Maci's relationship with Kyle went south, and there was even a discussion of a reunion between Maci and Ryan.
